title: GAS Pathways Toward Change: Ideologies and Gender Equality in a Silicon Valley Technology Company
description: Author Alison Wynn discusses her article, “Pathways Toward Change: Ideologies and Gender Equality in a Silicon Valley Technology Company,” published by Gender & Society.
